testcase.name: userinfo should be editable and match with selected language
testcase.system-out: Given user on the login page...............................................passed When user enters valid username "wallstreetbets"............................passed When user enter valid password "1234As$"....................................passed When user clicks on the Sign In button......................................passed When user clicks on the user name "team 37".................................passed When clicks team name "userinfo" button.....................................passed When user set the language as English.......................................passed When user clicks on the save button "save"..................................passed When user verifys options "populated info" in English.......................passed And user update the firstname "Newfirst"....................................passed And user update the lastname "NewLast"......................................passed And user update the email "new@gmail.com"...................................passed Then user closes the applicaiton............................................passed

testcase.name: userinfo should be in Turkish
testcase.system-out: Given user on the login page...............................................passed When user enters valid username "wallstreetbets"............................passed When user enter valid password "1234As$"....................................passed When user clicks on the Sign In button......................................passed When user clicks on the user name "team 37".................................passed When clicks team name "userinfo" button.....................................passed When user set the language as Turksih.......................................passed When user clicks on the save button "save"..................................passed When user verifys options "populated info" in Turkish.......................passed Then user closes the applicaiton............................................passed
